meanings.definition: A person who creates or coins phrases.
meanings.sent1: The phrasemakers in the marketing team come up with catchy slogans.
meanings.sent2: I admire the creativity of phrasemakers who craft memorable sayings.
meanings.sent3: The phrasemakers at the comedy club had the audience laughing all night.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a phrasemaker, constantly inventing new expressions.
meanings.sent5: The phrasemakers in literature have the power to inspire and move us with their words.

meanings.definition: A tool or device used to create phrases.
meanings.sent1: The phrasemakers on the computer helped me generate ideas for my essay.
meanings.sent2: I always keep a phrasemaker handy when writing to spark my creativity.
meanings.sent3: The phrasemaker app on my phone suggests interesting word combinations.

meanings.sent5: The phrasemaker in the classroom made language learning fun and engaging for the students.
